text: The Baisha Port is a port in Liuqiu Township, Pingtung County, Taiwan. It is the main port for people to get in and out from Liuqiu Island. ==Facilities== The port is equipped with visitor information center and other boat services, such as tour boats, glass bottom boats etc. ==Destinations== The port serves ferries to Donggang Township on the island of Taiwan. ==See also== * Transportation in Taiwan ==References== Category:Ports and harbors of Pingtung County
title: Baisha Port
